name: Naturals
description:
A Game of Numbers

Naturals is an easy to learn, hard to master game of basic math on Natural numbers. Apply addition, subtraction, multiplication and integer division operations to your current value to end up with values that are allowed through logic gates in order to complete each level.

Puzzle Elements:
  • Circles with numbers: One time integer operations that are applied to your value. These blocks are destroyed after a successful pickup.
  • Squares with numbers: Integer operations that can be applied any number of times.
  • Buttons and doors: Pick up small circles (buttons) to open doors (squares with holes in the middle) and get through.
  • Diamonds: Logic gates - You need to satisfy their condition to pass through.
  • Rounded diamonds: One-time logic gates - Once you go through them once, they are removed.
  • Teleporters: Go through a teleporter to end up at a different place.
